DOC.brief_summary: To determine protein kinase C beta play significant role vascular endothelial dysfunction , small fiber neural dysfunction , oxidative stress associate diabetes mellitus .
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes diagnose least 1 mo less 10 yr prior visit 1 HbA1c less 9 % fast plasma glucose le 260mg/dl Blood pressure le 160/100 mmHg Total cholesterol le 300 mg/dl and/or triglycerides less 600 mg/dl Subjects treat thiazolidinedione ( TZD ) 12 week prior visit 1 . History heart disease ( MI , unstable angina , CVA , TIA , CABG , percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty ) w/in 6 month visit 1 subject BYHA class III IV congestive heart failure . Female subject childbearing potential pregnant intend become pregnant ( i.e . practice acceptable method birth control ) TSH great 1.5 time upper limit normal V1 endocrine disease . ALT great 1.5 time upper limit normal V1 ; Serum creatinine great 2.0mg/dl V1 ; microalbumin great 300 .
